item.title: 中国外交部发言人批评美国强制剥离或禁止 TikTok 的法案时说，以国家安全为由削弱其他国家的竞争优势 "毫无公平可言"。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description:
There is ‘no fairness to speak of’ in citing national security to reduce the competitive advantage of other countries, a spokesperson of the Chinese foreign ministry said, criticizing a US bill to force a TikTok divestiture or ban. More here: https://t.co/pYX9Bbk1Yu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 赫伯罗特 2023 年净利润下降 83%，股息减少 85
item.description:
Hapag-Lloyd posts 83% lower net profit in 2023, cuts dividend by 85% https://t.co/xikjujfQnl pic.twitter.com/CaElcZmC3l

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 甲骨文公司表示，该公司正在其企业软件阵容中增加人工智能生成功能，从而加剧了与微软和其他技术公司在向企业客户销售人工智能技术方面的竞争。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
Oracle said it is adding generative artificial intelligence features across its corporate software lineup, intensifying competition with Microsoft and other technology firms to sell the technology to businesses customers. More here: https://t.co/y50qiRRy0O

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 瑞士议会下院明确通过一项动议，如果一家大型银行需要用公共资金来拯救，那么该银行的高级管理层必须退还过去十年收入的一半。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Switzerland's lower house of parliament clearly passed a motion to make senior management of a major bank return half their income over the previous decade if the lender has to be rescued with public money. More here: https://t.co/e4Rpohuylc

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 欧洲的私人信贷基金越来越多地向银行借款以提高业绩，这加剧了人们对这种相互关联所带来的更大风险的担忧。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Europe's private credit funds are increasingly borrowing from banks to boost their performance, fueling concerns about the wider risks posed by this interconnectedness. More here: https://t.co/O5f0zeykOh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 聚焦：违约风险上升，欧洲私人信贷与银行的联系加深
item.description:
Focus: Private credit ties to banks deepen in Europe as default risk rises https://t.co/vlsww8SJin pic.twitter.com/kJWRfjCnhz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank）房地产业务主管告诉 @路透社，德国正在经历一场长达四年的房地产危机，这场危机将导致更多的损失和无用房产的不良销售。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Germany is midway through a four-year real estate crisis that will lead to more losses and distressed sales of unwanted properties, the head of Commerzbank's real estate business told @Reuters. More here: https://t.co/58nAChAWOm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 波音公司的安全危机扰乱了航空公司的商业计划，航空公司高管对波音公司感到沮丧。但在由两家公司提供大型飞机的紧张市场中，他们别无选择，只能与美国飞机制造商合作。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Airline executives are frustrated with Boeing as its safety crisis has upended their business plans. But in a tight market for large aircraft supplied by two companies, they have little choice but do business with the US planemaker. More here: https://t.co/kcEARMtmNa

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 德本汉姆养老金计划同意 7.68 亿美元的克拉拉超级基金交易
item.description:
Debenhams pension scheme agrees $768 mln Clara superfund deal https://t.co/UKZNp5WWo3 pic.twitter.com/iJsOuZKIxl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：日本央行可能会结束负借贷成本时代。在本期Viewsroom播客中，Breakingviews专栏作家@aimeedonnellan、@guerreraf72和@ugalani认为，许多陷入困境的小企业可能会碰壁。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Japan's central bank could end an era of negative borrowing costs. In this Viewsroom podcast, Breakingviews columnists @aimeedonnellan, @guerreraf72 and @ugalani argue that many struggling small businesses could hit a wall https://t.co/mpz18TN7tE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 占全球经济总量 98% 的 134 个国家目前正在探索本国货币的数字版本，其中一半以上处于高级开发、试点或启动阶段。但美国正日益落在后面。更多信息，请点击此处：
item.description:
A total of 134 countries representing 98% of the global economy are now exploring digital versions of their currencies, with over half in advanced development, pilot or launch stages. But the United States is falling increasingly behind. More here: https://t.co/m8XNUiHGd8

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 观看：TikTok 的创建者和立法者对迫使应用程序所有者剥离美国资产或面临禁令的投票做出反应

item.title: 观看：由于投资者在英伟达（Nvidia）和其他芯片制造商的股票上获利了结，同时准备在下周美联储会议之前进一步了解通胀线索，美国市场指数收盘多数下跌
item.description:
WATCH: US market indexes ended mostly lower as investors took profits in shares of Nvidia and other chipmakers, while they prepared for further clues on inflation ahead of next week's Federal Reserve meeting https://t.co/Vc5ePi8dcv pic.twitter.com/nCnAGlLHd0

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024
